sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均可表示"唯一的"之意。
means: only ： 普通用词，常可与sole换用，但侧重仅限于指定的人或物，而不需要更多。
single ： 语气较强，强调仅此一个，再无第二个。
sole ： 语气强于only，指仅有一个或一群，只考虑这一个或这一群。
unique ： 非正式用词，侧重在一类中唯一无可匹敌、无与伦比的特征。
alone ： 着重专指某人或某物，而不是别的。

sentence.Network_en: If you're lonely when you're alone, you're in bad company.--Jean Paul Sartre
sentence.Network_cn: 如果你独处时感到寂寞，说明没有把自己陪好。

sentence.Network_en: Don't leave a child alone in a room with an open fire.
sentence.Network_cn: 房间里有裸露的明火时，不要让孩子独处其中。

sentence.Network_en: He knew when to leave well alone and when to interfere.
sentence.Network_cn: 他知道什么时候该适可而止，什么时候该插手干预。

jx.jx_en_mean: abandon or desert someone or something
stop disturbing or interfering with someone or something
jx.jx_cn_mean: 不妨碍，不打扰（某人或物）

entry.def: When you are alone, you are not with any other people.

example.ex: There is nothing so fearful as to be alone in a combat situation...
example.tran: 没有比孤身奋战更可怕的了。

example.ex: He was all alone in the middle of the hall.
example.tran: 他独自一人在大厅中间。

entry.tran: 单独的（无其他人在场的）
entry.def: If one person is alone with another person, or if two or more people are alone, they are together, without anyone else present.

example.ex: I couldn't imagine why he would want to be alone with me...
example.tran: 我想象不出为什么他会想和我独处。

example.ex: My brother and I were alone with Vincent.
example.tran: 我和弟弟与文森特单独呆着。

entry.tran: 孤苦伶仃的;无依无靠的；孤单的
entry.def: If you say that you are alone or feel alone, you mean that nobody who is with you, or nobody at all, cares about you.

example.ex: Never in her life had she felt so alone, so abandoned...
example.tran: 她一生中从来没有感到如此孤单，如此无助。

example.ex: He found himself alone in a hostile world.
example.tran: 他感到自己处在一个充满敌意的环境中，孤立无援。

entry.def: You say that one person or thing alone does something when you are emphasizing that only one person or thing is involved.

example.ex: You alone should determine what is right for you...
example.tran: 只有你自己才能决定什么适合你。

example.ex: They were convicted on forensic evidence alone.
example.tran: 仅凭着法医证据，他们就被判有罪。

entry.tran: 单单（强调部分或整体的数量）
entry.def: If you say that one person or thing alone is responsible for part of an amount, you are emphasizing the size of that part and the size of the total amount.

example.ex: The BBC alone is sending 300 technicians, directors and commentators...
example.tran: 单单英国广播公司就派出技术人员、导演、解说员等一行300人。

example.ex: Megastars like Jack Nicholson, who made $500 million from Batman alone, are unlikely to be affected.
example.tran: 像杰克·尼科尔森这样的巨星，单从《蝙蝠侠》一部片子中就赚了5亿美元，是不太可能受影响的。

entry.def: If someone is alone in doing something, they are the only person doing it, and so are different from other people.

example.ex: Newcastle is far from alone. Colleges around the country have developed programmes of student support...
example.tran: 远不止是纽卡斯尔，全国的许多大学都推出了助学项目。

example.ex: Am I alone in thinking that this scandal should finish his career?
example.tran: 只有我认为这件丑闻会断送他的事业吗？

entry.def: When someone does something alone, they do it without help from other people.

example.ex: Bringing up a child alone should give you a sense of achievement...
example.tran: 自己一个人带大孩子会给你一种成就感。

example.ex: He was working alone and did not have an accomplice.

entry.def: If you go it alone, you do something without any help from other people.

example.ex: I missed the stimulation of working with others when I tried to go it alone.
example.tran: 当我试图单干时，我很怀念与他人一起工作的那股兴奋劲。

sentences.sentence: "could be alone in a crowded room"
"he was alone when we met him"
"she is alone much of the time"
"a lonely fisherman stood on a tuft of gravel"

means.word_mean: 3. exclusive of anyone or anything else;

sentences.sentence: "I'll have this car and this car only"
"he is alone in the field of microbiology"
"this theory is altogether alone in its penetration of the problem"
"Bach was unique in his handling of counterpoint"
"a breakdown of law unparalleled in our history"

means.word_mean: 1. without any others being included or involved;

sentences.sentence: "a school devoted entirely to the needs of problem children"
"the burden of proof rests on the prosecution alone"

auth_sentence.content: That alone will determine if I deserve a medal.
auth_sentence.res_content: That alone will determine if I deserve a medal.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That alone will determine if I deserve a medal.

auth_sentence.content: Thousands of people died from starvation and illness alone.
auth_sentence.res_content: Thousands of people died from starvation and illness alone.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Thousands of people died from starvation and illness alone.

auth_sentence.content: Two men together is more than one man alone.
auth_sentence.res_content: Two men together is more than one man alone.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Two men together is more than one man alone.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 加在单词前,表示"在……,……的"; 2. 注:加在描述性的动词前面表形容词,常用作表语;加在名词,形容词前构成副词.

stems_affixes.word_buile: a在……,……的+shore岸→adv.向岸地, 在岸上地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 在远处, 到远处, 离去
stems_affixes.word_buile: a在……,……的+way路→沿着路去了远方

Sentence.sentence: Rachel Botsman, the author of a book on the subject, says the consumer peer-to-peer rental market alone is worth $ 26 billion
They feared neither spouse could manage alone.
Nearly nine million Americans alone suffer from the illness.
Elimination of waste alone can potentially provide over sixty percent more food for the growing world population
Wheat production takes 50% of its energy input for these two items alone.

means.word_mean: 单独的; 独一无二的
仅仅, 惟一, 只有

sentences.en: Time alone will show who was right.
sentences.cn: 只有时间能证明到底谁对。

sentences.en: I am not alone in this opinion.
sentences.cn: 持这种意见的不只是我一个人。

means.word_mean: 单独地, 独自地; （用于名词或代词后）唯一，只有

jushi.english: He would be respected for that one thing alone.
jushi.chinese: 仅凭那一件事他就会受到尊重。

jushi.english: He alone is not responsible for it.
jushi.chinese: 这件事只有他一个人毫无责任。

jushi.english: Hard work alone isn't enough, we must use our brains, too.
jushi.chinese: 光苦干还不行,我们还得动脑筋。
